name: Endless Fantasy Run
description:
Endless Fantasy Run

An endless runner game visualizing a fantasy world. Run as far as you can while exploring the alien world. Make sure to dodge obstacles in it.

Back Story

My 2nd game as an Indie Game Developer. This was my a massive step toward being a Game Developer after working on only 2D projects. This game was basically made for "Seamedu Awards" yet it was a learner and a roller coaster ride for me. Game is basically an endless runner but in a fantasy world.
